Plot: An insurance salesman/adjuster discovers his entire life is actually a T.V. show.
Title: The Truman Show
Actors: Jim Carrey, Laura Linney, Noah Emmerich, Natascha McElhone
tomatoConsensus: A funny, tender, and thought-provoking film, The Truman Show is all the more noteworthy for its remarkably prescient vision of runaway celebrity culture and a nation with an insatiable thirst for the private details of ordinary lives.
Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 38 wins & 66 nominations.
